meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Menyanthes, found in bogs and marshes.
meanings.sent1: The bogbean grows in wet areas like bogs and marshes.
meanings.sent2: People enjoy spotting the bogbean plant in swampy lands.
meanings.sent3: The bogbean decided to throw a party in the marsh.
meanings.sent4: In the sea of green, the bogbean stood out like a star.
meanings.sent5: The bogbean's presence in the bog was striking and beautiful.

meanings.definition: The bitter-tasting leaves of the bogbean plant, used in herbal medicine.
meanings.sent1: Herbalists often use bogbean leaves for their medicinal properties.
meanings.sent2: The bitter taste of bogbean leaves can be off-putting to some.
meanings.sent3: The bogbean leaves joked about their bitter flavor at the herb party.
meanings.sent4: In the world of herbs, bogbean leaves are the unsung heroes.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of bogbean leaves filled the room with a strong, earthy scent.
